input.body:
Hey @ErikMartensson,

:unamused: Your PR doesn't modify any tests, so it's hard to know what's being fixed, and your changes might regress in the future. Please consider [adding tests](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped#user-content-test-editing-an-existing-package) to cover the change you're making. Including tests allows this PR to be merged by yourself and the owners of this module. This can potentially save days of time for you.
<!--typescript_bot_suggest-testing-->
